Won't play in New (6 months) DVD player.

"Disc cannot be played(ISO9660)"

First used Magic ISO to burn and got failure. Yes, I chose DVD Video file when prompted. 
Then I used DVD Decrypter and re-made ISO.
Still no progress.

Had to unpack it to the hard drive then use Nero BR and pick:
File -> New -> DVD-Video -> New (button at bottom). That creates a new -blank- compilation, ready for the files.

Copy only the *contents* of the unpacked VIDEO_TS folder into the Nero Compilation VIDEO_TS folder. Save it. Burn it. Works a peach.

Nothing goes in AUDIO_TS folder, but it has to be there.

Hope this helps someone.
